CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `example`;
USE `example`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `example`.`student`
(
  /*------------------------*/
  /* MEMBER VARIABLES       */
  /*------------------------*/

  /*student Associations*/
  mentor_name_1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  mentor_name_2 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  mentor_name_3 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  
  /*student Attributes*/
  number VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY(number)

);
